greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 1; and for n > 0, a(n) = a(n-1) + (A008966(4n+1) - A107078(4n+3)).
comment: After a(0)=1, each term a(n) is either (a) one more than its predecessor, in case 4n+1 and 4n+3 are both squarefree, (b) stays same if only the other one is squarefree, or (c) decreases by one if neither 4n+1 nor 4n+3 are squarefree.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 16 2017
